sentences.en: Anyone who does not believe that smoking is an addiction has never been a chronic smoker.
sentences.cn: 不相信抽烟能上瘾的人肯定不是老烟民。

sentences.en: Areas of drug dealing are hellholes of addiction, poverty and murder.

sentences.en: Drug addiction soon played havoc with his career.
sentences.cn: 毒瘾很快就毁掉了他的事业。

sentences.en: Giving up an addiction is a humbling experience.
sentences.cn: 戒瘾是一次让人重新认识自己的经历。

sentences.en: He is now fighting his addiction to alcohol.

sentences.en: The topic of addiction remains something of a taboo.

sentences.en: Underneath this image of normalcy, addiction threatened to rip this family apart.
sentences.cn: 在这一切正常的表象下潜伏的是将使这个家庭四分五裂的毒瘾。

sentences.en: We must concentrate our energies on treating addiction first.
sentences.cn: 我们必须首先集中精力治疗毒瘾。
